findings.title: Reentrancy
findings.description: Danger of calling external contracts and creating reentrancy vulnerabilities.
findings.location: constructor(), transferFrom(address,address,uint256), _transfer(address,address,uint256), swapAndLiquify(uint256), _rebalance(uint256), deposit(uint256,uint256), withdraw(uint256,uint256), emergencyWithdraw(uint256)

findings.title: Compiler version should be fixed
findings.description: Unfixed compiler version may handle certain language constructions in an unforeseen way.

findings.title: Coding Style Issues
findings.description: Influence code readability and may lead to bugs in future.

findings.title: Order of layout
findings.description: Layout contract elements do not follow solidity style guide.

findings.title: Naming convention issues â€“ Variables, Structs, Functions
findings.description: Do not follow all solidity naming conventions to maintain readability of code.

findings.title: Use local variable instead of state variable like length in a loop
findings.description: Consumes extra gas for every iteration of the for loop.

findings.title: Implicit Visibility
findings.description: Good practice to explicitly define visibility of state variables, functions, interface functions and fallback functions.

findings.title: Use external function modifier instead of public
findings.description: Save gas by declaring public functions as external.

findings.title: _decimals should be constant
findings.description: Not fixed, recommended to make constants.

findings.title: _name should be constant
findings.description: Not fixed, recommended to make constants.

findings.title: _symbol should be constant
findings.description: Not fixed, recommended to make constants.

findings.title: _tokenTotal should be constant
findings.description: Not fixed, recommended to make constants.

findings.title: Various low-level severity issues
findings.description: Constant declarations, gas optimization tips, and more
